name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals who demand crystal-clear audio quality.

name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Comfortable and versatile cotton t-shirt made from 100% organic cotton. Perfect for everyday wear with a relaxed fit and soft feel.

name: Professional Coffee Maker
description: Programmable drip coffee maker with thermal carafe and built-in grinder. Brew the perfect cup every morning with customizable strength settings.

name: Running Shoes - Performance Series
description: Lightweight running shoes with responsive cushioning and breathable mesh upper. Designed for long-distance runners and fitness enthusiasts.

name: Smartphone Case - Ultra Protection
description: Military-grade protection smartphone case with shock-absorbing corners and raised edges. Compatible with wireless charging.

name: Denim Jacket - Vintage Style
description: Classic denim jacket with a vintage wash and comfortable fit. Made from premium denim with authentic detailing and durable construction.

name: Indoor Plant Collection Set
description: Set of three low-maintenance indoor plants perfect for beginners. Includes snake plant, pothos, and ZZ plant with decorative pots.

name: Yoga Mat - Premium Quality
description: Non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials. Extra thick cushioning for comfort during practice with alignment guides.

name: Wireless Mouse - Ergonomic Design
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with precision tracking and long battery life. Perfect for office work and gaming with customizable buttons.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Handcrafted leather crossbody bag with adjustable strap and multiple compartments. Perfect for daily use with timeless style.

name: Kitchen Knife Set - Professional
description: Professional-grade kitchen knife set with high-carbon steel blades and ergonomic handles. Includes chef, paring, and utility knives with storage block.

name: Resistance Band Set
description: Complete resistance band set with multiple resistance levels, door anchor, and exercise guide. Perfect for home workouts and physical therapy.
